adrFormatAddress: 1216 Broadway 2nd floor, New York, NY 10001-4301, USA

originalText.text: I have been getting my hair colored by Crystal for the last few months, and I cannot say enough about how happy I am with my results. She is an absolute professional and really understands hair. My hair always looks amazing and feels super healthy after my appointments with her. I really appreciate her dedication to using clean products. She has such a warm and welcoming personality, and it's so evident how much she cares about the wellbeing and best interests of her clients. She is the best!

originalText.text: I had an amazing experience with Crystal.  She is a highly skilled professional and a  beautiful soul, inside and out.  While she worked, we chatted about clean beauty and health products and life in general.  I love how she colored and styled my hair and will definitely be a returning customer.  I highly recommend her for all of your hair care and beauty needs.

text.text: I had an amazing experience with Crystal.  She is a highly skilled professional and a  beautiful soul, inside and out.  While she worked, we chatted about clean beauty and health products and life in general.  I love how she colored and styled my hair and will definitely be a returning customer.  I highly recommend her for all of your hair care and beauty needs.

originalText.text: Always a 5 star experience! I have been going to Crystal for 10 years now, followed her from salon to salon and was very proud to see when she ventured out on her own. She is creative, talented, resourceful and always has her client's best interest in mind. She had the foresight to go into the clean beauty space in hair, learn and educate her clients on the benefits of clean products. But not only that, she is an amazing stylist, who always consciously provides the best advice for your hair type, lifestyle and budget. I have always gotten maintenance free cuts from her and look forward to the 1:1 personal experience I can have with her at her own salon. Proud to call her my stylist and FRIEND! Highly recommend!! :)

originalText.text: I cannot recommend Crystal highly enough! I saw her for balayage, which involved highlights and a custom mix of dyes and toners (all meeting Crystal's clean beauty standards, which I love) to get exactly the right red hair look I wanted, and it came out perfect. At the same time, I booked a haircut as I was due for a trim, and it's one of the best haircuts I've ever had. Crystal is so welcoming and friendly (and patient - I have long hair!). A wonderful experience all around.

originalText.text: Crystal is awesome!! I recently had my first appointment with her. She is so knowledgeable and really takes the time to discuss your hair type and how to obtain the result you’re looking for. She provided such a personalized experience. My hair is already so much more manageable after one visit. I look forward to future appointments!
